abiDocs.name: setRate
abiDocs.details: Allows the owner to set new exchange rate.

abiDocs.name: setCollectingToken
abiDocs.details: Allows the owner to set the collecting token address.

abiDocs.name: setSupplyTokenOnce
abiDocs.details: Allows the owner to set the supply token address (can be set only once).

abiDocs.name: buySupplyToken
abiDocs.details: buySupplyToken; the place where exchanges are done.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
